desc.message: Adds infinite scrolling, site icons, server locations, View image button and Download image button.

unload_pages_text.message: Unload pages that are off-screen (less RAM consumption)

sticky_header_text.message: Stick header on top of the page

show_view_img_btn_on_img_previews_text.message: Show "View image" button when hovering over image preview

show_search_by_img_btn_on_img_previews_t.message: Show "Search by image" button when hovering over image preview

show_download_img_btn_on_img_previews_te.message: Show "Download image" button when hovering over image preview

show_save_as_btn_on_img_previews_text.message: Show "Save as" button when hovering over image preview

show_copy_img_url_btn_on_img_previews_te.message: Show "Copy image URL" button when hovering over image preview

show_download_all_imgs_btn_text.message: Show "Download all images" button in tools menu

download_imgs_path_help_title.message: The path to the folder in the downloads folder, into which downloaded images will go. May contain subfolders. Must not contain symbols prohibited by the operating system. If the folder does not exist, it will be created on the first download. Leave empty to download images into the default folder. Example: !Google/Images

rate_text.message: ⭐️ Rate this extension if you like it

donate_link_text.message: 💖 Support the development of this extension by donating any amount via PayPal
